description: Initializes a Temporal Self-Attention (TAE) classification model. This component sets up the model structure but does not perform training or handle data splitting. The resulting model can be trained later using ``ml_fit``.

parameters.name: optimizer
parameters.description: The optimizer to use for training.

parameters.name: learning_rate
parameters.description: The learning rate for the optimizer.

parameters.name: epsilon
parameters.description: A small constant for numerical stability in the optimizer.

parameters.name: weight_decay
parameters.description: Weight decay (L2 penalty) for the optimizer.

parameters.name: lr_decay_epochs
parameters.description: Number of epochs between learning rate decay steps.

parameters.name: lr_decay_rate
parameters.description: Rate at which the learning rate decays.

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: A randomization seed to use for reproducibility. If not given or `null`, no seed is used and results may differ on subsequent use.

returns.description: A model object that can be trained using ``ml_fit``.

links.title: V. Garnot, L. Landrieu, S. Giordano, and N. Chehata (2020), Satellite Image Time Series Classification With Pixel-Set Encoders and Temporal Self-Attention
